main_titleInputName: Name may contain only letters, apostrophe, dash and spaces. For example Adrian, Jacob Mercer, Charles de Batz de Castelmore d'Artagnan
main_titleInputPhone: Phone number must be digits and can contain spaces, dashes, parentheses and can start with +
singup_titleInputName: Name may contain only letters, apostrophe, dash and spaces. For example Adrian, Jacob Mercer, Charles de Batz de Castelmore d'Artagnan
demo_createAccountText: You can create your personal account! It will be stored in the database and will be accessible from any device.
demo_createAccountWarning: This is an educational project, the database is cleaned within a month. Also, please don't use your real passwords, because f#ck it
demo_crudContactText: You can or and remove contacts from your phonebook!
demo_crudContactGifAlt: gif video how to add or delete contacts
demo_findContactText: Tired of scrolling down for 10 minutes to find Elon Musk? You can now search for contacts by name! And it will take just 3.1415926 milliseconds!
demo_findContactAlt: gif video how to search for contacts
demo_findContactWarning: You can spend the saved time on writing to the author how cool he is
demo_switchLanguageText: Still don't know Ukrainian? What a pity..... But we made a language switch just for you!
demo_switchLanguageGifAlt: gif video how to change language
demo_enjoyDesignText: Oh, how iridescent the background is... Oh, how beautifully the buttons stick... Oh, what a cool spinner
demo_thankAuthorText: Well, if you've already poked here so confidently, you should also write me
